criteria.name: Analytical & Problem-Solving Capability
criteria.description: Ability to structure ambiguous problems, synthesize data, develop insights

evaluation_guidance.9-10: Top-tier analytical background (MBB, PE, quant finance, PhD STEM); demonstrated complex problem-solving
evaluation_guidance.7-8: Strong analytical role (consulting, corp strategy, investment banking); clear structured thinking
evaluation_guidance.5-6: Analytical exposure (data analysis, operations, finance); some problem-solving evidence
evaluation_guidance.0-2: No analytical background or weak evidence

criteria.jd_evidence: * Exceptional problem-solving skills with the ability to untangle complex issues

criteria.name: Client Engagement & Impact
criteria.description: Experience delivering value to clients/stakeholders, managing relationships

evaluation_guidance.9-10: Direct client-facing consulting or advisory; proven impact with measurable outcomes
evaluation_guidance.7-8: Internal consulting, stakeholder management, or customer success with clear results
evaluation_guidance.5-6: Cross-functional collaboration or indirect client work

criteria.jd_evidence: Consulting | As a consultant, you will work closely with senior client executives and McKinsey colleagues in the most entrepreneurial environments and help to develop sector-shaping and nation-transforming programs.

criteria.name: Business & Functional Knowledge
criteria.description: Understanding of business operations, strategy, functional domains

evaluation_guidance.9-10: Deep functional expertise (strategy, ops, marketing, finance) + business leadership
evaluation_guidance.7-8: Solid functional experience in 2+ domains; business impact visible
evaluation_guidance.5-6: Functional depth in 1 domain; some cross-functional exposure
evaluation_guidance.3-4: Narrow functional focus; limited business context

criteria.jd_evidence: * Solid functional knowledge, including but not limited to strategy, business development, manufacturing, supply chain, product development, project management, marketing and sales, etc. | * Operations

criteria.name: Communication & Synthesis
criteria.description: Ability to distill complex ideas, present clearly, influence stakeholders

evaluation_guidance.9-10: Executive presentations, published thought leadership, teaching/coaching
evaluation_guidance.7-8: Regular stakeholder presentations, written communication (reports, memos)

criteria.name: Learning Agility & Adaptability
criteria.description: Speed of picking up new domains, industries, methodologies

evaluation_guidance.9-10: Pivoted successfully across industries/functions; rapid skill acquisition visible
evaluation_guidance.7-8: Clear learning curve in career (promotions, scope growth)

criteria.jd_evidence: * **Continuous learning:** Our learning and apprenticeship culture, backed by structured programs, is all about helping you grow while creating an environment where feedback is clear, actionable, and focused on your development. The real magic happens when you take the input from others to heart and embrace the fast-paced learning experience, owning your journey.

criteria.name: Leadership & Initiative
criteria.description: Leading teams, projects, initiatives; taking ownership

evaluation_guidance.9-10: Led teams of 10+, P&L ownership, launched new initiatives
evaluation_guidance.7-8: Led projects/teams of 5+, clear ownership moments
evaluation_guidance.5-6: Informal leadership or small team leadership

criteria.jd_evidence: * Ability to take initiative and eager to break new ground, create opportunities for others, and take personal risks | regarding our global EEO policy and diversity initiatives, please visit our

criteria.name: Quantitative & Technical Capability
criteria.description: Comfort with numbers, data, modeling, technical tools

evaluation_guidance.9-10: Advanced quant work (modeling, ML, statistical analysis, econometrics)
evaluation_guidance.7-8: Regular data analysis, Excel modeling, SQL/Python

criteria.name: Educational Background

evaluation_guidance.9-10: Top-tier undergrad (Ivy+) + graduate degree (MBA, PhD) with honors
evaluation_guidance.7-8: Strong undergrad + graduate degree, or top undergrad alone

criteria.jd_evidence: * Undergraduate degree with outstanding academic record and/or Masters, MBA, PhD

criteria.name: Industry Expertise

evaluation_guidance.9-10: 10+ years in target industry with recognized expertise

criteria.jd_evidence: As a consultant, you will work closely with senior client executives and McKinsey colleagues in the most entrepreneurial environments and help to develop sector-shaping and nation-transforming programs. | You will work in our Sydney, Canberra, Melbourne, Brisbane, Perth, or Auckland office. With over 50-years experience in Australia and New Zealand, our work spans multiple sectors of the economy including the social sector. We are ambitious for our clients - we want to work with them as they strive for world-class performance. Our vision is based on seeing organizations in Australia and New Zealand achieve their potential, and to help realize the economic and social benefits for all citizens.

meta_signals.trajectory: Career progression (promotions, scope growth, responsibility increases)
meta_signals.achievement_density: Quantified outcomes, measurable impact per role
meta_signals.learning_velocity: Speed of skill/domain acquisition across roles
